Stay away if you don't like stressing

What i mean is if you want to play this game because you want to play killer. Then sorry to tell you but this is completely survivor orientated. Now when i first started playing this game is around Myers release or pig.... can't remember. But, when i played back then even this game was way to survivor friendly. I mean yea, you could win easy on lower rank survivor mains but as you progress and undoubtedly you will cuz unless you just don't get this game within the next couple of hours playing it, you will rank up easy. But its the "red" ranks you got to worry about.

Let me explain. Most if not all red ranked lobbies will have swf  surv mains kill squad ( swf means survive with friends btw.....btw mean by the way....anyways) that both know the broken bs in the game and will use said bs. They will always consistently troll you in post game chat (devs said they were going to start banning people for that at a time but i ? it didn't happen or didn't happen for long,idk.) about how trash u are or how unfair/trash you played.

I've recently quit because of the change to ruin, which really ( and is say this reluctantly) the only thing stopping survivors rushing the gens, SOMETIMES. That't the thing too, the gen speed the chase ratio is completely unfair to killer . You chase or don't chase, you'll lose, you break pallets, you'll lose, you hook survivors, you'll lose, you do your obj as killer, ? what? YOU'LL LOSE! This is especially true against red ranks.

You'll almost always be called a tunneler (chasing after one survivor the whole match) or a camper (staying near the hook). But they really will come up with anything, even if you beat them fair and square because there are so many perks (decisive strike, borrowed time), items/ add-ons for the survivor to use that it really doesn't matter if you did play this way. Beside, if you do play this way you will both de-rank and not get very many blood points which is used to rank up killer/survivor to get perks,item, and more importantly add-ons for killers. Which sort of solidifies my argument of surv oriented and all.

If you want to play this game cuz your favorite movie killer is in the game then ? what.....they are all pretty much trash. The only killers really with anything are really Nurse or Spirit. Anyone else is just dependent on hopefully facing a team that is a 3 man with at least one potato, GL though. These surv mains are really the most toxic community that i have ever witnessed EVER in any PvP game EVER. Even more so than Rainbow,,,,,and that's BAD! There are even channels exist where their primary content is just that, trolling killers. Which is easy to do.....because this game is survivor orientated....*clap* *clap* surv mains,lol.

In conclusion, I say try it for yourself if you don't believe me because there is fun to be had in this game with friends.....but that's it. Doing solo surv or doing killer your going to have a bad time. Like pizza when ur suppose to french fry, lol. Also imo, swf is killing this game cuz of comms. Comms break the game, period.

Don't let the surv mains tell you otherwise and don't believe that sorry excuse " oh, this is a casual game". NO IT'S NOT, THIS GAME IS PVP. WHICH IS COMPLETELY COMPETITIVE. Ya'll just want a bully simulator simple as that.

Don't play killer, you've been warned.

Amazing game, maps are pretty cramped though so yeah overall great graphics, great game, options to be killer or survivor have fun with the game.

Fattest learning curve i've ever had to go through in my fucking life, this game is dog shit sometimes, but it is very satisfying to play once it isn't trash. The dopamine you get whenever you succeed a chase or down a survivor is a type of satisfaction that you don't get for any other game. There's a lot of learning and variables to have to account for and go through, but this just allows the game to have infinite possibilities offering immense replay ability. In conclusion, 1. fix latency for window vaulting please, 2. the way you have to think in real time to counter play your opponent is highly enjoyable, and 3. this game is hard but fun (sometimes). If you log a lot of hours in this game you will have a love/hate relationship with this game.

[h1] Dead by Daylight [/h1]

Fun concept but how it is currently is terrible. Very few perk variations being used by both killers and survivors making many of the matches play out the exact same. I get that it's supposed to be repetitive since every match is the same objective (and no new modes have been added since the 2016 release) but at least buff/nerf some of the perks so there's some actual variation in the way people play. You can pretty much predict what the killer is going to be running every single game and quickly figure out the slightly larger variation each survivor might be using.

Instead of fixing what's currently in the game they just keep adding new killers and survivors since that's what brings in the money. This would be one of the highlights since it is actually possible to unlock all of the added characters through just playing the game, but the amount of time that it takes to unlock even one of these new survivors/killers is ridiculous. In my 30 hours of playtime I didn't even get a quarter of the way to unlocking a single new character and there's SO many. 

The highlight of this game for me was playing as survivor with friends. It's a lot of fun to mess with each other or just work together to hit the killer with every pallet on the map. The ranking system kinda ruins the fun a lot though if you or your friend is a high rank. Normally the higher up you go the harder the killers get and the more meta their perk set will be. Most matches quickly devolve into getting camped on the hook while the other players farm you for blood points. Overall can't really recommend playing this unless you and your friend are both new and just want something to waste time on or you're both experienced.

Zajebista :3

Hallo zusammen, eigentlich ist es ein spannendes und treibendes Spiel. 
ABER: Die Killer können sich erlauben was sie wollen. Campen bei Opfern am Haken ohne das Mates helfen können. Diverse Spiele endeten damit, dass 2-3 Leute am Boden lagen und nur nacheinander auf den Haken kamen. DC´s von Spielern werden ja nach dem letzten Update bestraft, so ist man voll und ganz der Gnade der Killer ausgeliefert. Und diese Personen feiern das, indem sie einen quälen bis zum geht nicht mehr. Man sitzt machtlos vor dem PC und sieht zu, wie die Mates einer nach dem anderen am Haken hängen bis zum Tode. Und der Killer dabei die ganze Zeit zusieht.... Und dieses Verhalten wird seitens des Supports nicht geandet. Sollte man dann doch einen durch Teamwork abhängen können, werden diese meist direkt vom Killer verfolgt. Die anderen werden ignoriert, auch wenn sie sich in den Weg stellen.
Ich habe kein Problem damit, sehr häufig zu sterben. Das ist Teil des Spiels. Aber mit der "Sadismus"Mentalität die hier mittlerweile Einzug gehalten hast, bin ich einer von denen die dem Spiel den Rücken kehren. Und ich rate jedem aktuell von Kauf des Spieles ab!!!

O jogo evoluiu bastante desde o lançamento, hoje tem bem mais conteúdos. Mas uma coisa que ainda é constante nesse tipo de jogo é o desbalanceamento entre o killer e os sobreviventes. Tirando isso o jogo é divertido, jogar em call faz a partida ser bem mais proveitosa, já que jogar com randoms é quase uma roleta russa. Uma dica que eu dou pra quem está começando a jogar é que não vale a pena tentar ajudar os outros sobreviventes depois que os portões forem abertos porque eles não vão tentar te ajudar se estiverem na sua situação haha
